deactivate_machine.description: Press the button to deactivate the washing machine.

polish_button.description: Wipe the button to keep it clean and shiny.

press_washing_machine_start_button.description: Press the start button on the washing machine to begin the wash cycle.

wipe_washing_machine_button.description: Clean the button on the washing machine to remove any dust or residue.

secure_door.description: Rotate the door to the closed position to secure the washing machine.

close_door.description: Close the washing machine door by rotating it on its axis to the closed position.

access_machine.description: Rotate the door to the opened position to access the inside of the washing machine.

verify_door_lock.description: Ensure the door is securely locked.

open_washing_machine_door.description: Open the washing machine door by rotating it on its axis.

confirm_door_closed.description: Ensure the washing machine door is securely closed.

maintain_surface.description: Wipe the body of the machine to ensure a clean surface.

clean_washing_machine_body.description: Clean the body of the washing machine to keep it looking new and free from dust or grime.

sanitize_washing_machine.description: Clean the entire machine, including the body, door, and button to keep it sanitary.

clean_entire_washing_machine.description: Clean the entire washing machine, including the body, door, and button to maintain cleanliness.
